mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.self_service_id AS "selfServiceId", a.menu_id AS "menuId", a.menu_sort AS "menuSort", a.pid AS "pid", a.menu_end_date AS "menuEndDate", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_date AS "createDate"
mapper.select: SELECT ,s.menu_operate AS "menuOperate" FROM org_self_service_vs_menu a left join ( select o.menu_id,r.menu_operate from org_self_service_vs_menu o left join role_service_menu r on o.id = r.menu_id where o.self_service_id = #{0} and r.role_service_id = ( select id from org_role_vs_service where service_id =#{0} and role_id =#{1})) s on s.menu_id = a.menu_id where a.self_service_id=#{0} and a.del_flag='0' ORDER BY a.menu_sort
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO org_self_service_vs_menu( id, self_service_id, menu_id, menu_sort, pid, menu_end_date, create_by, remarks, update_by, update_date, del_flag, create_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{selfServiceId}, #{menuId}, #{menuSort}, #{pid}, #{menuEndDate}, #{createBy}, #{remarks}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{createDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE org_self_service_vs_menu SET self_service_id = #{selfServiceId}, menu_id = #{menuId}, menu_sort = #{menuSort}, pid = #{pid}, menu_end_date = #{menuEndDate}, create_by = #{createBy}, remarks = #{remark}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, create_date = #{createDate} WHERE id = #{id}
